content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To increase player engagement through user segmentation and personalization by language and time zone, Epic Games needed a single push notification service for multiple games within their brand. They engaged EPAM to create a solution for centralized, flexible, and simplified notification management.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM developed a PNS that went into production in March 2020.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Epic Games can now easily reach out to target players to keep them informed on limited time modes, feature alerts, and new store items.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":37297,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/936a974f-f5e3-4ff9-b52f-9c99e8a53f0d/14.JPG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/936a974f-f5e3-4ff9-b52f-9c99e8a53f0d/14.JPG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"14.JPG\",\"name\":\"14.JPG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"936a974f-f5e3-4ff9-b52f-9c99e8a53f0d\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":501,\"height\":564},\"extension\":\"JPG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
